item.title: 2 children killed, 17 hurt in mass shooting at Catholic school church
item.description: An 8-year-old and 10-year-old were shot and killed when a gunman fired shots through the windows of a church at the Annunciation Catholic School in Mi...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: FDA approves updated COVID vaccines with restrictions
item.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Wednesday approved updated COVID-19 vaccines with restrictions on who can receive the shots.

item.title: WATCH: Student at Minneapolis Catholic school describes shooting
item.description: A student at Annunciation Catholic School in Minneapolis described hearing gunfire during a shooting at the school on Wednesday morning.

item.title: WATCH: Shooter at Annunciation Catholic School in Minneapolis believed to be deceased
item.description: There are multiple victims from a shooting that unfolded during morning drop-off at Annunciation Catholic School in Minneapolis, sources told ABC News...
